text: @Jersey_Craig @PressSec @kayleighmcenany How could someone possess the absolute complete lack of intelligence to make a statement like ‘you will not see the coronavirus come here’. Like how caught up in the Fox moment are you? Usually that statement would ruin you. But in America it makes you Lard Ass’ Press Secretary
